text: Allah Taalaa ney tumharay liye aik misaal khud tumhari hi biyan farmaee jo kuch hum ney tumhen dey rakha hai kiya uss mein tumharay ghulamon mein say bhi koi tumhara shareek hai? Kiya tum aur woh iss mein barabar darjay kay ho? Aur tum inn ka aisa khatra rakhtay ho jaisa khud apno ka hum aqal rakhney walon kay liye issi tarah khol khol ker aayaten biyan ker detay hain
